incidents.name: Programmable Wireless SMS Commands Delivery Delays

incident_updates.body: Between 21:36 PDT and 22:46 PDT, we have observed Mobile Originated (MO) and Mobile Terminated (MT) Programmable Wireless SMS Commands being delayed and/or dropped (with failed status). The issue has been identified and resolved. We are now seeing traffic being delivered again without any delays. This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: Some International Calls Might Have Failed Due to a Parsing Error

incident_updates.body: Due to a software update, some international To numbers were incorrectly parsed for 20 hours and 47 minutes between 17:14 on 04/20/2023 and 12:01 on 04/21/2023 Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have experienced calls failures.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with voice calls got blocked. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
